lead_paragraph: Some in the Miami region retain the traditional resentment of the Castro government, but many more welcome the president’s visit as an opportunity.

headline.print_headline: Rancor Yields to Hope for Many in Miami Area
headline.main: Reaction to Obama Trip Reflects Change in Cuban-Americans

snippet: Some in the Miami region retain the traditional resentment of the Castro government, but many more welcome the president’s visit as an opportunity.
abstract: Most Cuban-Americans living in Miami are excited about Pres Obama's trip to Cuba, but warn that far-reaching change on island is not likely.
